content.webTitle: Italy: six reasons to love the place

fields.headline: Italy: six reasons to love the place
fields.bodyText: Food Pasta, pizza, ice cream, cheese, salami … Children Not just tolerated but actively adored and welcomed everywhere. The economy The overall picture might look grim but not for luxury brands. Ferrari and Prada both reported perky results this week. Next to Britain, Italy is a hive of manufacturing zeal. Sport The second most successful football team in world cup history, Italy continues to produce world class players – and managers Trains They link just about all the major cities, and are fast and cheap. Culture Home to the greatest number of Unesco World Heritage Sites (47) and the birthplace of the Roman empire.
